items.name: Apple
items.description: A delicious fruit with a crisp texture.

items.name: Banana
items.description: A tropical fruit with a yellow skin.

items.name: Orange
items.description: A citrus fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.

items.name: Grapes
items.description: Small, sweet, and juicy berries often used for making wine.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: A red, juicy berry often used in desserts.

items.name: Blueberry
items.description: Small, dark-blue or purple berries known for their antioxidants.

items.name: Mango
items.description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and juicy flesh.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: A tropical fruit with a spiky exterior and sweet, tangy taste.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: Large, juicy fruit with green rind and sweet, pink flesh.

items.name: Kiwi
items.description: Small, green fruit with a tangy and slightly sweet flavor.

items.name: Peach
items.description: A soft, fuzzy fruit with a sweet and fragrant taste.

items.name: Cherry
items.description: Small, round fruit with sweet or tart flavors.

items.name: Pear
items.description: A sweet and juicy fruit with a distinctive shape.

items.name: Plum
items.description: A small, round fruit with a sweet or tart taste.

items.name: Grapefruit
items.description: Large, citrus fruit known for its tart flavor.
